sentences.en: Austin displayed conduct unbecoming of an officer and a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 奥斯汀的行为不符合军官和绅士的身份。

sentences.en: His conduct was totally unbecoming to an officer in the British armed services.
sentences.cn: 作为一名英军军官，他的行为极不得体。

sentences.en: It is utterly unbecoming of him to do such a thing.
sentences.cn: 干这种事与他的身分极不相称.

sentences.en: It was thought unbecoming for young ladies to smoke.
sentences.cn: 年轻女子吸烟被认为有欠斯文.

sentences.en: Remember what unbecoming to do is also unbecoming to speak of.
sentences.cn: 记住:不适合去做的事,也是不适合说的事.

sentences.en: She felt that tears were unbecoming and foolish.
sentences.cn: 她觉得流泪是不恰当的,是愚蠢的.

sentences.en: She was wearing an unbecoming shade of purple.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身不相配的紫色衣服。

sentences.en: Solution : Wearing your breakfast, lunch or dinner on your shirt unbecoming.
sentences.cn: 是否看看你的衬衫就能 猜 出你早点或者午餐吃了什么呢?

sentences.en: Stop dishing the dirt, girls, it's really quite unbecoming!
sentences.cn: 别再讲人家闲话了, 姑娘们, 这很不光彩.

sentences.en: Stop dishing the dirt, Sally. It's really quite unbecoming.
sentences.cn: 萨利,别讲人家的闲话吧, 那是很不体面的.

sentences.en: Such honour is unbecoming to [ for ] him.
sentences.cn: 这种荣誉对他不 相称.

sentences.en: Such thoughts are unbecoming to you.
sentences.cn: 这些想法与你的身份不相称.

sentences.en: The colours are unbecoming to her complexion.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色与她的肤色不相配.

sentences.en: The secret of remaining young is never to have an emotion that is unbecoming.
sentences.cn: 永葆青春的秘诀就是决不要产生不合时宜的感情.

sentences.en: You must not do what is unbecoming for your situation.
sentences.cn: 你绝不能做出与你的地位不相称的事情.

sentences.en: You really must not allow yourself to become sunburnt. It would be unbecoming.
sentences.cn: 你千万不能让皮肤晒黑, 这是不相宜的.

trans.tran_cn: 不合身的，不相配的，难看的，不雅观，不相称
trans.tran_en: clothes that are unbecoming make you look unattractive
